messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 1568
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 11/4/2001 1:58:57 PM Eastern Standard Time, ... I am on digest, and skimming most of these, and I knew she was talking about California. . .
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 11/4/2001 1:58:57 PM Eastern Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:


> << Yes, teachers are required to join the union. >>
>
> Please limit statements like this to a state or district or time. Or quote
> the question.


I am on digest, and skimming most of these, and I knew she was talking about
California. . . that is all she has been talking about. It doesn't seem to be
misinformation at all to me.

lovemary


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
